ing: 6 ounces semisweet chocolate (such as Baker'sÂ®), chopped
des: "A rich hot fudge sauce that is great over ice cream, fresh strawberries, or as a cake filling when cooled."
ins: Heat sweetened condensed milk and chocolate in a heavy saucepan over medium-low heat until chocolate is melted, stirring often, about 5 minutes. Remove from heat. Add butter and stir until melted, about 5 minutes more.
